desc.en: Koharu summons an exhausted Sensei for another scolding but seeing how exhausted Sensei is causes her delusions to run wild.
desc.jp: Koharu summons an exhausted Sensei for another scolding but seeing how exhausted Sensei is causes her delusions to run wild.
desc.zh_cn: 把筋疲力尽的老师叫出来的{cf小春}，虽然和平常一样斥责老师，但是看到老师筋疲力尽的样子，她脑中的妄想就开始暴走了。

desc.en: Sensei buys the dessert Yoshimi wanted and plans to slip it into her shoe locker. Yoshimi, however, catches Sensei in the act and suspects something unseemly. In the end, they end up going to a cafe to eat the dessert together.
desc.jp: Sensei buys the dessert Yoshimi wanted and plans to slip it into her shoe locker. Yoshimi, however, catches Sensei in the act and suspects something unseemly. In the end, they end up going to a cafe to eat the dessert together.
desc.zh_cn: 老师买了{cf喜美}想要的甜点，正想偷偷放进她的鞋柜。但是却在过程中被{cf喜美}发现而被当成变态。为了以后一起享用而前往咖啡厅。

hobby.zh_cn_cn: 参加活动、收藏限定甜点

desc.en: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.jp: Sometimes it's good to have a cup of tea and relaxed. Example: Cherry Merry Berry
desc.zh_cn: 有些时候，停下来饮杯茶也不错。举例/联想：Cherry Merry Berry

desc.en: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.jp: Aside from all the ups and downs, we need some to to relax our mind. Example: Lemonade Diary, Nesno wons. Main characteristics are soft, gentle.
desc.zh_cn: 在大起大落的事情里外，我们总需要一点闲适的时间来放松自己的神经。举例/联想：Lemonade Diary、Nesno wons；特征是较为温柔。

desc.en: The 10th track in Blue Archive, used in relationship stories majorly.

desc.zh_cn: 蔚蓝档案OST中的第十首曲子，主要用于羁绊故事中。

desc.en: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.jp: In Kivotos, no future is dark; even so, it was temporary, as it will point to the bright ending that is possible to reach. Example: Connected Sky, Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?
desc.zh_cn: 在基沃托斯，没有任何一个未来是黑暗的；即使有，那也只是暂时的，因为最终这一切都将指向光明，而那光明并非遥不可及。举例/联想：Connected Sky，Does the color of the sky mean anything special to you?

desc.en: Serina and Hanae are out on charity activities with Sensei when they overhear that the Justice Task Force is preparing an end-of-year party. Knowing how the Justice Task Force is always tirelessly working to keep the school safe, Serina and Hanae are all too happy to learn that they're taking time to enjoy themselves.
desc.jp: Serina and Hanae are out on charity activities with Sensei when they overhear that the Justice Task Force is preparing an end-of-year party. Knowing how the Justice Task Force is always tirelessly working to keep the school safe, Serina and Hanae are all too happy to learn that they're taking time to enjoy themselves.
desc.zh_cn: 和老师一起准备慈善活动的{cf芹奈}和{cf花绘}，偶然从{cn实现正义部}成员口中听见{cn实现正义部}在准备圣诞晚会的消息。{cn实现正义部}一直以来都为了校内的治安而付出辛劳，得知他们要休息的消息后，{cf芹奈}和{cf花绘}觉得很开心。

hobby.jp: ダンス、チアリーディング

name.en: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.jp: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.zh_cn: 教堂的圣诞祝福～{cn救护骑士团}的礼物～

desc.en: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.jp: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯今年也迎来了圣诞节。这是所有人一同分享喜悦的神圣日子。在这样的日子里，{cn救护骑士团}仍一如既往地四处「救护」，让我们来一窥她们既日常又特别的一天吧～

name.en: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.jp: The Cathedral's Merry Christmas: Remedial Knights' Gift
name.zh_cn: 教堂的圣诞祝福～{cn救护骑士团}的礼物～

desc.en: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.jp: Christmas is here in the snow-covered winter wonderland of Kivotos. The Remedial Knights have no qualms about having to work even on the most joyous and hallowed of days for the sake of "salvation." Let's follow them on this special day!
desc.zh_cn: 奇普托斯今年也迎来了圣诞节。这是所有人一同分享喜悦的神圣日子。在这样的日子里，{cn救护骑士团}仍一如既往地四处「救护」，让我们来一窥她们既日常又特别的一天吧～

desc.en: Asuna jumps out to surprise Sensei before pulling Valentine's Day chocolates from her cleavage. A cat-and-mouse chase begins as Sensei tries to get away from the melted chocolate while Asuna tries to feed it to Sensei.
desc.jp: Asuna jumps out to surprise Sensei before pulling Valentine's Day chocolates from her cleavage. A cat-and-mouse chase begins as Sensei tries to get away from the melted chocolate while Asuna tries to feed it to Sensei.
desc.zh_cn: 在惊喜现身后，{cf明日奈}突然从胸口掏出一盒情人节巧克力，并且表示要送给老师。由于巧克力的造型太过特别，不敢收下的老师索性转身逃跑，然而{cf明日奈}却为了逼老师吃掉她送的巧克力，开始四处追杀老师。

long.jp: ミレニアムサイエンススクール
